survey.name: GHAC Donor Survey
survey.description: Conversational survey to gather donor feedback and community input

b0.content: Hi! I'm Amanda Roy, CEO of the Greater Hartford Arts Council.

b0a.content: Click play below to hear why I'm excited to chat with you today. (Or click "Skip Video" if you are the eager type! üòÇ)

b1a-skip.content: Alright! Let's get right to it!

b1b.content: We take your privacy seriously (but not ourselves) üòú

b1c.content: By continuing you're cool with how we use your answers, just to get smarter, not nosier. Want details? Here's the short and full version of our policy.

links.text: short and full version of our policy

b2.content: Ready to share your thoughts? (It'll take about 8-10 minutes)

b2-info-1.content: We're reimagining how GHAC connects with our community. Instead of one-way communication, we want real conversations. Your insights will directly shape how we support artists, arts organizations, fund programming and strengthen our arts ecosystem across all 34 towns we serve.

b2-info-2.content: This isn't a fundraising survey‚Äîit's a listening tour. Your participation is voluntary and you can skip any question you're not comfortable answering.

b2-info-goodbye.content: All good! Thanks for stopping by. I invite you to pop on over to our site to learn more about the Greater Hartford Arts Council. Until next time!! üëã

b2-info-exit.content: Want to explore what GHAC is up to right now?

b3.content: First things first, I'd love to know your first name so we can make this conversation more personal. What should I call you?

b3-response.content: Love the name, {{user_name}}! I am excited to chat with you.

b4.content: How would you **best describe** your connection to the Greater Hartford Arts Council?

options.label: I've supported GHAC in the past
I participated through a workplace giving campaign
I'm connected through an artist or arts organization
This is my first time learning about GHAC

b4-past-engagement.content: Welcome back! When was the last time you engaged or donated to the Greater Hartford Arts Council?

content.current-supporter: That's awesome{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! Thank you for being part of our community. Your ongoing support makes such a difference.
content.past-supporter: It's great to reconnect with you{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! Things have evolved quite a bit since we last connected.
content.workplace: Ah yes, the workplace giving programs! Those introduced so many people to our work.
content.connected-artist: The lifeblood of our community{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! Love hearing this.
content.first-time: Well let me be the first to welcome you{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! I'm so glad you're taking time to learn about what we do.

b4a-other.content: Do tell! I'd love to hear more about your connection to us{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}.

b5.content: The arts ecosystem includes many different touchpoints. How do you currently connect with the arts in our region? (Select all that apply)

options.label: I attend performances, exhibitions, or events
I visit museums, galleries, or cultural sites
I have friends or family who are artists
I see arts as vital to community wellbeing
I believe arts education is essential

b5-other-only.content: Can you tell me a bit more ‚Äî how are you connected to the arts in your own words?
b5-other-only.placeholder: Share your connection to the arts...

content.single: Thank you for sharing your connection to the arts{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! Every connection matters to our creative community.
content.multiple: Wow! You are deeply connected to the arts{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}!

b5-multiple-with-other.content: You seem deeply connected AND you've got a unique story...

b5-other-multi.content: Can you tell me a bit more ‚Äî how are you connected to the arts in your own words?

b6.content: When you think about the role of arts in the Greater Hartford region, how essential do you believe they are?

options.label: Not Essential
options.description: Nice to have, but not essential

content.low: I appreciate your honesty{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. Different things matter to different people.

conditionalContent.content: That's a balanced perspective{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}‚Äîquality of life matters.
I love your passion for the arts{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! That energy is contagious.
Thanks for sharing your perspective{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}!

b7-thanks-gif.content:
Awesome! Thank you for sharing that!

![Thank you!](https://media2.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExeG51anptaXVsOXhyMGhjYTdzeTV0dnJqd205bTB1NXBpbTkxbG90dSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/xThta8yQ3CleP8Esnu/giphy.gif)

content.skip: No problem at all! Let's keep going.
content.responded: Thank you for sharing that‚Äîit really brings your experience to life!

b7-permission.content: With your permission, I'd love to potentially share inspiring stories like yours publicly to celebrate our creative community and show others the impact of the arts. Would you be comfortable with GHAC sharing your story?

b7-permission-yes.content: Awesome{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. That means a lot. Your perspective helps us understand what the arts mean to our community.

b7-permission-no.content: No problem{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. We will only use your response for internal research. Thank you for sharing your story! Your perspective helps us understand what the arts mean to our community.

content.supporter: Thinking about why you've chosen to support GHAC or other arts organizations, what drives your giving decisions most?
content.non-supporter: If you were to support an arts organization, what would be the **#1 most important** thing to you?

options.label: Knowing my support directly helps individual artists
Ensuring arts access for underserved communities

b8-other.content: I'd love to hear what motivates you‚Äîevery perspective helps us understand our community better.

b9.content:
Sounds pretty important to me{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}!

Based on what you know about GHAC‚Äîeven if it's limited‚ÄîI'm curious where you'd place us on these spectrums. Be honest! This really helps us understand how we're perceived.
b9.followUp: Thanks for that honest assessment! Your perception helps us understand how we're showing up in the community.

b9-response.content: Your insights are incredibly valuable. Thank you for your candor.

b10.content: Organizations can connect with supporters in many ways. What type of relationship would feel **most meaningful** to you?

options.label: Keep me informed and inspired with stories of impact
Invite me to special experiences and behind-the-scenes moments
Include me in important decisions about our arts future
Connect me with other people who care about the arts
Let me support from a distance without much interaction
Engage my professional skills to help artists thrive
I'm still figuring out what would work best for me

b10-response.content: That's really helpful to know{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}, thank you.

b11.content: What, if anything, makes it challenging to engage with arts organizations? Your honesty helps us do better. Select all that apply:

options.label: It's unclear how my support creates real change
I don't always feel personally welcomed or valued
Past experiences that felt transactional or impersonal
Nothing‚ÄîI'm satisfied with my current level of engagement

followUp.nothing: That's wonderful to hear! It sounds like you've found a good balance.
followUp.default: Thank you for that honest feedback. Understanding these challenges helps us create better ways to connect.

content.skip: No problem at all, let's continue!
content.responded: What a thoughtful vision‚Äîthank you for sharing that!

b12-permission.content:
What a thoughtful vision‚Äîthank you for sharing that!

With your permission, we'd love to potentially share inspiring stories like yours publicly to celebrate our creative community and show others the impact of the arts. Would you be comfortable with GHAC sharing your story?

b12-permission-yes.content: Awesome{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. That means a lot. Your perspective helps us understand what the arts mean to our community.

b12-permission-no.content: No problem{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. We will only use your response for internal research. Thank you for sharing your story! Your perspective helps us understand what the arts mean to our community.

b13.content: Creativity shows up in many ways. Which of these resonate with your personal relationship to creativity? Select any that feel true.

options.label: I pursue creative hobbies in my free time
I wish I had more creative outlets in my life
Creative problem-solving is part of my work
I'm passionate about specific art forms
I see supporting artists as part of civic responsibility
I believe traditional arts deserve preservation

b13-other.content: I would love to hear more about your personal relationship to creativity. Tell me about it...

b14.content: As we look ahead, what would you **most like to see** strengthened in Greater Hartford's arts ecosystem? (To rank, drag and drop the cards below into your preferred order)

options.label: Public art that reflects our community's diversity
Creative spaces for artists to work and gather

b14.followUp: Those priorities really paint a picture of the creative community you envision!

b15.content:
Everyone contributes differently to our creative community. What specific opportunities might interest you in the next year?

No pressure‚Äîjust exploring possibilities! Select any that appeal to you:

options.label: Learning about artists and their stories
Setting up monthly or quarterly giving
I need to learn more first

b15-learn-more.content:
Totally get that‚Äîwanting to learn more before jumping in shows real thoughtfulness.

You'll find more info about who we are at the end of this survey...

b16.content: If we were to share updates about our impact and opportunities, how would you prefer to hear from us? (Check all that apply).

b16-contact-confirm.content: I'm so glad you want to stay connected! If you'd like I can gather your contact information now to make sure we can stay in touch. What do you think?

b16-contact-great.content: Amazing! I am so glad we are going to stay connected!

b16-contact-preface.content: Feel free to share any or all ways to stay in touch.

b16-no-updates.content: Got it ‚Äî no updates for now{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. I'm still so glad you joined our conversation.

b16-chat-again.content: Great! We will work on putting more of these together!

content.great:
Great! Follow us on social media for updates.

Find us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greaterhartfordarts/), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/letsgoarts/), and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/greater-hartford-arts-council/).

Thank you for connecting with us!
content.also:
Also! Follow us on social media for updates.

Find us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greaterhartfordarts/), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/letsgoarts/), and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/greater-hartford-arts-council/).

Thank you for connecting with us!

b17.content: One last question, How valuable was this conversation for you?

conditionalContent.content: Thanks for letting us know{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. We'll keep working to make these conversations more useful.
Appreciate your honesty{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. I'll take that as a cue to keep improving.
Glad to hear it{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! That means a lot and keeps me motivated.

b18.content: Before we wrap up, would you be willing to share a bit more about yourself? This helps us understand who makes up our creative community. (It's completely optional and confidential)

b19.content: Awesome, thank you{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}! Which age range best describes you?

b19.2.content: What best describes your gender identity?

b19.2-self-describe.content: Of course{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. Please describe your gender.

b19.2-prefer-not.content: All good{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. You are such a rockstar, we are almost done!

b19.3.content: How would you describe your racial or ethnic background? Select all that apply.

b19.3-self-describe.content: Of course{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}. Please describe your race and ethnicity.

b19.3-prefer-not.content: No problem, let's keep moving! Just 2 more!

content.donor: If you're comfortable sharing, what's been your typical annual support level for GHAC?
content.potential: If you were to contribute any amount to GHAC, what would you be most comfortable with? No wrong answers here{{#if user_name}}, {{user_name}}{{/if}}!

b19.5.content: One last thing... what's your ZIP code? (I know you may have shared this with me already, but this helps us ensure we're serving everyone where they are!)

b20.content:
{{#if user_name}}{{user_name}}, thank{{else}}Thank{{/if}} you so, so much for this conversation!

Your insights help us reimagine what it means to be a catalyst for the arts in the Greater Hartford region.

This isn't the end of a survey‚Äîit's the beginning of a relationship. Together, we're building something special: a creative community where artists thrive, everyone has access to transformative arts experiences, and the arts are recognized as essential to our collective wellbeing.

Welcome to the GHAC studio. üé®

Your friend, Amanda

b20-no-share.content:
{{#if user_name}}{{user_name}}, can't{{else}}Can't{{/if}} thank you enough for taking the time to chat with me today. I don't take that lightly and I can't wait to share the results with you soon. In the meantime, please feel free to learn more about what we're up to and how you can get involved.

Until then! üëã See you soon.

Your friend,

Amanda
